prompts.text: Hi [patient.resourceType], on a scale of 1-10, would you recommend Dr [doctor.resourceType] to a friend or family member? 1 = Would not recommend, 10 = Would strongly recommend
Thank you. You were diagnosed with [diagnosis.code.coding.name]. Did Dr [doctor.name.family] explain how to manage this diagnosis in a way you could understand?
We appreciate the feedback. One last question: How do you feel about being diagnosed with [diagnosis.code.coding.name]?
